title: Sherlock : Malware Detecting Chatbot
description: Chatbot - Detects Malware. Provides help to users to remove malware from their system. Accepts Image and translated text from it.

title: Jobify: React Job Platform
description: Full Stack MERN App. With MongoDB database. Using Express Server. Multiple Auth - Admin, User. Users can create/modify/delete jobs. Admin can oversee security

title: University Management System
description: University Website. Multiple Auth - Admin, Professors, Students. Admission Portal. Marksheet Distributor.

title: Tourism Trip Booking Platform
description: Full Stack WAMP App. With MySql database. Using PHP Server. Multiple Auth - Admin, User. Users can book differrent packages for their trips. Admin can oversee security
